text: Behold, 2. 18 Gr. do enter.we shall enter into a part of the city, and thou shalt set 2. 18 Gr. the sign.a sign; thou shalt bind this scarlet cord in the window, by which thou hast let us down, and thou shalt bring in to thyself, into thy house, thy father, and thy mother, and thy brethren, and all the family of thy father.
